# <code>{{ $frontmatter.title }}</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.math }}</div>

## Signature

```> math sqrt {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input        | output       |
| ------------ | ------------ |
| list\<number\> | list\<number\> |
| number       | number       |
## Examples

Compute the square root of each number in a list
```nu
> [9 16] | math sqrt
╭───┬───╮
│ 0 │ 3 │
│ 1 │ 4 │
╰───┴───╯

```
